comments:
Resets mixer to default settings.

Bits 7-1: Reserved(0)
Bit 0: Reset stop (0)

PROCEDURE:
a) Load index register
b) Wait 100Âµs
c) Write reset stop

Bits 7-5: Left master volume (SBPro)
Bit 4: Reserved(1)
Bits 3-1: Right master volume (SBPro)
Bit 0: Reserved(1)

DEFAULT: 099h, N/A

Bits 7-5 (SBPro): Left DAC level bits
Bits 7-4 (SB16): Left DAC level bits
Bits 3-1 (SBPro): Right DAC level bits
Bits 3-0 (SB16): Right DAC level bits

DEFAULT: 099h, 0CCh

Mixer detection can be accomplished by looking for this register index.
SoundBlaster 16 will automatically update registers 031h and 032h, transferring bits 7-4 and setting bit 3.

Bit 7: Reserved(0)
Bit 6: FM Right Channel (0=on, 1=off)
Bit 5: FM Left Channel (0=on, 1=off)
Bit 4: Reserved(1)
Bits 3-1: FM level
Bit 0: Reserved(1)

DEFAULT: 019h, N/A

FM level controls both channels.
If only one channel is active, the inactive channel's voices will be routed through the active one.
SoundBlaster Pro will automatically update register 026h, transferring source bits 3-0 to destination bits 7-4 and 3-0.

Bits 7-3: Reserved(0)
Bits 2-1 (SBPro): Microphone level
Bits 2-0 (SB16): Microphone level

DEFAULT: 011h, 000h

Bits 7-6: Reserved(0)
Bit 5: Filter Input (SBPro) 0=on 1=off
Bit 4: Reserved(0)
Bit 3: Frequency (0=highpass, 1=lowpass)
Bits 2-1: Input select 0=Microphone 1=CD audio 3=Line in
Bit 0: Reserved(1)

DEFAULT: 011h, N/A

SoundBlaster 16 uses command 0Bxh/0Cxh for stereo output

Bits 7-6: Reserved(0)
Bit 5: Filter Output (SBPro) 0=on 1=off
Bit 4: Reserved(1)
Bits 3-2: Reserved(0)
Bit 1: Stereo Output Mode (SBPro) 1=Stereo 0=Mono
Bit 0: Reserved(1)

DEFAULT: 011h, N/A

Bits 7-5 (SBPro): Left Master
Bits 7-4 (SB16): Left Master
Bits 3-1 (SBPro): Right Master
Bits 3-0 (SB16): Right Master

DEFAULT: 011h, 0CCh

SoundBlaster 16 will automatically update registers 030h and 031h, transferring bits 7-4 and setting bit 3.
SoundBlaster Pro register 002h is the same as this.

Bits 7-5 (SBPro): Left FM
Bits 7-4 (SB16): Left FM
Bits 3-1 (SBPro): Right FM
Bits 3-0 (SB16): Right FM

DEFAULT: 011h, 0CCh

SoundBlaster 16 will automatically update registers 033h and 034h, transferring bits 7-4 and setting bit 3.
SoundBlaster Pro will automatically update register 006h, transferring bits 3-1 and setting bit 0.
